headline.main: North Dakota's Job Landscape Shifting (for Now) Away From Big Oil
headline.print_headline: North Dakota's Job Landscape Shifting (for Now) Away From Big Oil

docs.snippet: Halliburton Co, Schlumberger NV and other large energy companies were conspicuously absent from a major North Dakota job fair this week, a telling sign as employers in the No. 2 U.S. oil-producing state grapple with sliding crude prices....
docs.lead_paragraph: Halliburton Co, Schlumberger NV and other large energy companies were conspicuously absent from a major North Dakota job fair this week, a telling sign as employers in the No. 2 U.S. oil-producing state grapple with sliding crude prices.

headline.main: UK to Join China-Backed Asian Development Bank
headline.print_headline: UK to Join China-Backed Asian Development Bank

docs.snippet: Britain said it will seek to become a founding member of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB), a new regional body backed by China that has raised concerns in the United States about governance standards....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain said it will seek to become a founding member of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB), a new regional body backed by China that has raised concerns in the United States about governance standards.

headline.main: Man Accidentally Shoots Self to Death While Riding Bicycle
headline.print_headline: Man Accidentally Shoots Self to Death While Riding Bicycle

docs.snippet: Police in St. Petersburg, Florida, say a man died after accidentally shooting himself while riding a bicycle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in St. Petersburg, Florida, say a man died after accidentally shooting himself while riding a bicycle.

headline.main: Arias Temporarily Banned From Jail Calls, Video Chats
headline.print_headline: Arias Temporarily Banned From Jail Calls, Video Chats

docs.snippet: Convicted murderer Jodi Arias will have to go without phone calls and video chats in jail for now unless they have to do with legal matters, the Maricopa County sheriff said Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Convicted murderer Jodi Arias will have to go without phone calls and video chats in jail for now unless they have to do with legal matters, the Maricopa County sheriff said Thursday.

headline.main: Andre Berto, Josesito Lopez Hoping to Please TV Audiences
headline.print_headline: Andre Berto, Josesito Lopez Hoping to Please TV Audiences

docs.snippet: Andre Berto, Josesito Lopez and Shawn Porter are all thrilled to be a part of the second show for Premier Boxing Champions, the high-profile endeavor designed to put their sport in front of new audiences and television networks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andre Berto, Josesito Lopez and Shawn Porter are all thrilled to be a part of the second show for Premier Boxing Champions, the high-profile endeavor designed to put their sport in front of new audiences and television networks.

headline.main: Labor Dept. Puts Late Sen. Kennedy in Its 'Hall of Honor'
headline.print_headline: Labor Dept. Puts Late Sen. Kennedy in Its 'Hall of Honor'

docs.snippet: The late Sen. Edward M. Kennedy of Massachusetts was memorialized Thursday as a tireless champion of working families at a Labor Department ceremony inducting him into the agency's "Labor Hall of Honor."...
docs.lead_paragraph: The late Sen. Edward M. Kennedy of Massachusetts was memorialized Thursday as a tireless champion of working families at a Labor Department ceremony inducting him into the agency's "Labor Hall of Honor."

headline.main: Brazil Arrests Former Italian Guerrilla Pending Deportation
headline.print_headline: Brazil Arrests Former Italian Guerrilla Pending Deportation

docs.snippet: Brazilian police arrested on Thursday an Italian former leftist guerrilla wanted for murder in his country, but released him hours later after an injunction suspended his deportation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian police arrested on Thursday an Italian former leftist guerrilla wanted for murder in his country, but released him hours later after an injunction suspended his deportation.

headline.main: '09 US Open Star Oudin 'Probably' Needs 2nd Heart Procedure
headline.print_headline: '09 US Open Star Oudin 'Probably' Needs 2nd Heart Procedure

docs.snippet: In the latest health issue for surprise 2009 U.S. Open quarterfinalist Melanie Oudin, the tennis pro says her heart problems have returned, pushing back the start to her season....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the latest health issue for surprise 2009 U.S. Open quarterfinalist Melanie Oudin, the tennis pro says her heart problems have returned, pushing back the start to her season.

headline.main: Boko Haram targets Arabs in reprisal for Chad offensive
headline.sub: Boko Haram targets Arabs in reprisal for Chad offensive

docs.snippet: Boko Haram is carrying out ethnic reprisals against Arabic speakers in northern Nigeria, forcing some 10,000 refugees to cross into Cameroon in recent weeks. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Boko Haram is carrying out ethnic reprisals against Arabic speakers in northern Nigeria, forcing some 10,000 refugees to cross into Cameroon in recent weeks. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.main: London Fashions a Show in Memory of Designer Alexander McQueen
headline.print_headline: London Fashions a Show in Memory of Designer Alexander McQueen

docs.snippet: A butterfly he address, feathered gowns and garments crafted from horns, hair and seashells went on display in London this week in a exhibition celebrating the work of the late British fashion designer Alexander McQueen....
docs.lead_paragraph: A butterfly he address, feathered gowns and garments crafted from horns, hair and seashells went on display in London this week in a exhibition celebrating the work of the late British fashion designer Alexander McQueen.
